description: Create a time sheet cost code allocation.
permissions: User must be an admin or a member of the customer associated with the time sheet customer.
side_effects: After commit, updates related project_phase_cost_item_actuals for the allocation.
validation_notes: The --time-sheet and --details flags are required. --details must be a JSON array of objects and include at least one allocation; each allocation may only include cost_code_id, percentage, and optional project_cost_classification_id; percentage must be between 0 and 1; total allocation percentage must equal 1.0 (100%); cost_code_id values must belong to the customer; duplicate cost_code_id values are not allowed.

flags.name: --details
flags.validation: JSON array of objects; must include at least one allocation
